Package net.sf.image4j.io

Class LittleEndianOutputStream

java.lang.Object
java.io.OutputStream
java.io.FilterOutputStream
java.io.DataOutputStream
net.sf.image4j.io.LittleEndianOutputStream
All Implemented Interfaces:
Closeable, DataOutput, Flushable, AutoCloseable
public class LittleEndianOutputStream extends DataOutputStream
Writes little-endian data to a target OutputStream by reversing byte ordering.
Author:
Ian McDonagh
